introduction: Ngipri Monkey is a horror film that raised Indonesia-mystical myth science Pesugihan among peoples Indonesia . The film is directed by L. Sudjio and starring Muni Cader , Anna Tairas and Tony Hidayat. Aired simultaneously in theaters in 1988 .Unable to bear because insulted continue, especially children stricken with severe pain, Parjo (Muni Cader) select a shortcut: ngipri on white monkeys with expensive ransom. In addition should not have or take his property itself, Parjo must surrender her as a scapegoat. Her neighbor was shocked, because Parjo suddenly become rich. Parjo unleashed revenge on those who insulted him, although his son did not agree. The boy tried to save his parents, but to no avail.
